title: So is Harrowing coming or not?
body: Why hasn't there been any news of a release date for the Harrowing Skins? Rito Pls! {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
The Harrowing is happening already. The Stories, the updated champion Bios... thats all part of the harrowing. The Skins will be released later this week.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/11/red-post-collection-harrowing-legacy.html#2
